Package de.oth.blocklib.networking

Class ServerNetworkManager

java.lang.Object
de.oth.blocklib.networking.NetworkManager
de.oth.blocklib.networking.ServerNetworkManager
public class ServerNetworkManager
extends NetworkManager
Manager class for the server's network operations.
Get an instance by using the NetworkManagerBuilder.
Author:
Matthias Wagner

      Throws:

    • registerMessageListener

      public void registerMessageListener​(java.lang.Class<? extends NetworkMessage> messageClazz, NetworkManager.MessageListener messageListener)
      Register a NetworkManager.MessageListener which is called when a message of a certain type is received.
      Parameters:
      messageClazz - trigger when a message of this class is received; use NetworkMessage to get notified for every type of message
      messageListener - the listener to call when a message was received

    • unregisterMessageListener

      public void unregisterMessageListener​(java.lang.Class<? extends NetworkMessage> messageClazz, NetworkManager.MessageListener messageListener)
      Unregister a previously registered NetworkManager.MessageListener.
      Parameters:
      messageClazz - the message type of the previously registered listener
      messageListener - the previously registered listener

    • registerConnectionChangedListener

      public void registerConnectionChangedListener​(NetworkManager.ConnectionChangedListener connectionChangedListener)
      Register a NetworkManager.ConnectionChangedListener which is called when the one of the server's connections' state changes.
      Parameters:
      connectionChangedListener - the listener to call when the one of the server's connections' state changes

    • unregisterConnectionChangedListener

      public void unregisterConnectionChangedListener​(NetworkManager.ConnectionChangedListener connectionChangedListener)
      Unregister a previously registered NetworkManager.ConnectionChangedListener.

      connectionChangedListener - the previously registered listener

    • registerMessageAcknowledgedListener

      public void registerMessageAcknowledgedListener​(NetworkManager.AcknowledgeListener messageAcknowledgedListener)
      Register a NetworkManager.AcknowledgeListener which is called when the remote received a message which has requested reliable transmission.
      Parameters:
      messageAcknowledgedListener - the listener to call when the remote received the message

      Parameters:
      messageAcknowledgedListener - the previously registered listener

    • getConnections

      java.util.Map<java.net.InetSocketAddress,​NetworkConnection> getConnections()
      Returns a map that provides each client's address together with the connection to the client.
      Returns:
      a mapping from client addresses to their corresponding connections
